TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit NotificationListenerService extends Android.App.Service

Docs.summary: A service that receives calls from the system when new notifications are posted or removed, or their ranking changed.

remarks.para:
A service that receives calls from the system when new notifications are posted or removed, or their ranking changed.
<service android:name=".NotificationListener" android:label="@string/service_name" android:permission="android.permission.BIND_NOTIFICATION_LISTENER_SERVICE"> <intent-filter> <action android:name="android.service.notification.NotificationListenerService" /> </intent-filter> </service>
To extend this class, you must declare the service in your manifest file with the permission and include an intent filter with the action. For example:

The constructor will initializes the property of the new instance using and .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void CancelAllNotifications() cil managed

Docs.summary: Inform the notification manager about dismissal of all notifications.

remarks.para: Inform the notification manager about dismissal of all notifications.

Use this if your listener has a user interface that allows the user to dismiss all notifications, similar to the behavior of Android's status bar and notification panel. It should be called after the user invokes the "dismiss all" function of your UI; upon being informed, the notification manager will actually remove all active notifications and you will get multiple callbacks.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void CancelNotification(string key) cil managed

Docs.param: Notification to dismiss from .
Docs.summary: Inform the notification manager about dismissal of a single notification.

remarks.para: Inform the notification manager about dismissal of a single notification.

Use this if your listener has a user interface that allows the user to dismiss individual notifications, similar to the behavior of Android's status bar and notification panel. It should be called after the user dismisses a single notification using your UI; upon being informed, the notification manager will actually remove the notification and you will get an callback.
Note: If your listener allows the user to fire a notification's by tapping/clicking/etc., you should call this method at that time if the Notification in question has the flag set.

MemberSignature.Value: public void CancelNotification (string pkg, string tag, int id);
.method public hidebysig instance void CancelNotification(string pkg, string tag, int32 id) cil managed

Docs.summary: Inform the notification manager about dismissal of a single notification.

remarks.para: Inform the notification manager about dismissal of a single notification.

Use this if your listener has a user interface that allows the user to dismiss individual notifications, similar to the behavior of Android's status bar and notification panel. It should be called after the user dismisses a single notification using your UI; upon being informed, the notification manager will actually remove the notification and you will get an callback.
Note: If your listener allows the user to fire a notification's by tapping/clicking/etc., you should call this method at that time if the Notification in question has the flag set.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void CancelNotifications(string[] keys) cil managed

Docs.param: Notifications to dismiss, or null to dismiss all.
Docs.summary: Inform the notification manager about dismissal of specific notifications.

remarks.para: Inform the notification manager about dismissal of specific notifications.
Use this if your listener has a user interface that allows the user to dismiss multiple notifications at once.

Docs.summary: Gets the current notification interruption filter active on the host.

remarks.para: Gets the current notification interruption filter active on the host.

The interruption filter defines which notifications are allowed to interrupt the user (e.g. via sound & vibration) and is applied globally. Listeners can find out whether a specific notification matched the interruption filter via .

The current filter may differ from the previously requested filter if the notification host does not support or refuses to apply the requested filter, or if another component changed the filter in the meantime.
Listen for updates using .

Docs.summary: Gets the set of hints representing current state.

remarks.para: Gets the set of hints representing current state.
The current state may differ from the requested state if the hint represents state shared across all listeners or a feature the notification host does not support or refuses to grant.

Docs.summary: Returns current ranking information.

remarks.para: Returns current ranking information.
The returned object represents the current ranking snapshot and only applies for currently active notifications.

Generally you should use the RankingMap that is passed with events such as , , and so on. This method should only be used when needing access outside of such events, for example to retrieve the RankingMap right after initialization.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Android.Service.Notification.StatusBarNotification[] GetActiveNotifications() cil managed

Docs.summary: Request the list of outstanding notifications (that is, those that are visible to the current user).

remarks.para: Request the list of outstanding notifications (that is, those that are visible to the current user). Useful when you don't know what's already been posted.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Android.Service.Notification.StatusBarNotification[] GetActiveNotifications(string[] keys) cil managed

Docs.param: the keys of the notifications to request
Docs.summary: Request one or more notifications by key.

remarks.para: Request one or more notifications by key. Useful if you have been keeping track of notifications but didn't want to retain the bits, and now need to go back and extract more data out of those notifications.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class Android.OS.IBinder OnBind(class Android.Content.Intent intent) cil managed

Docs.param: The Intent that was used to bind to this service, as given to . Note that any extras that were included with the Intent at that point will not be seen here.
Docs.summary: Return the communication channel to the service.

remarks.para: Return the communication channel to the service. May return null if clients can not bind to the service. The returned is usually for a complex interface that has been described using aidl.

Note that unlike other application components, calls on to the IBinder interface returned here may not happen on the main thread of the process. More information about the main thread can be found in Processes and Threads.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnNotificationRemoved(class Android.Service.Notification.StatusBarNotification sbn) cil managed

Docs.param: A data structure encapsulating at least the original information (tag and id) and source (package name) used to post the that was just removed.
Docs.summary: Implement this method to learn when notifications are removed.

remarks.para: Implement this method to learn when notifications are removed.
This might occur because the user has dismissed the notification using system UI (or another notification listener) or because the app has withdrawn the notification.

NOTE: The object you receive will be "light"; that is, the result from may be missing some heavyweight fields such as and . However, all other fields on , sufficient to match this call with a prior call to , will be intact.

The current ranking map that can be used to retrieve ranking information for active notifications.
Docs.summary: Implement this method to learn when notifications are removed.

remarks.para: Implement this method to learn when notifications are removed.
This might occur because the user has dismissed the notification using system UI (or another notification listener) or because the app has withdrawn the notification.

NOTE: The object you receive will be "light"; that is, the result from may be missing some heavyweight fields such as and . However, all other fields on , sufficient to match this call with a prior call to , will be intact.

This is merely a request, the host may or may not choose to apply the requested interruption filter depending on other listener requests or other global state.

Docs.summary: This API supports the Mono for Android infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
Docs.value: A which contains the java.lang.Class JNI value corresponding to this type.

remarks.para: This property is used to control which jclass is provided to methods like .

Docs.summary: This API supports the Mono for Android infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
Docs.value: A which provides the declaring type.

remarks.para: This property is used to control virtual vs. non virtual method dispatch against the underlying JNI object. When this property is equal to the declaring type, then virtual method invocation against the JNI object is performed; otherwise, we assume that the method was overridden by a derived type, and perform non-virtual methdo invocation.
